title: How to Make Cinnamon Bagels

steps.headline: In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water.
steps.description:
Add 3 tsp. brown sugar and cinnamon; mix well. Add flour and stir to form a soft dough. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a0\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a0\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Sprinkle flour on to workstation, knead the dough until smooth.
Punch dough down and shape into 12 balls.
steps.description:
Push your thumb through the center to form a hole. Stretch and shape dough to form an even ring. Place on floured surface. Cover and let rest for 10 - 15 minutes. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/09\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/09\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Boil some water and pour in a bowl.
steps.description:
Drop 2 bagels at a time and leave for 45 seconds, turn over and cook for another 45 seconds. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b3\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b3\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} When finished, take them out the bowl and drain with a paper towel. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/78\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet2.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/78\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet2.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Combine topping ingredients and sprinkle over bagels.
steps.description:
Put them in separated, on baking sheets, coated with cooking spray. Bake at 400 degrees for 15 - 20 minutes or until golden brown. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/34\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/34\/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

text:
In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water. Add 3 tsp. brown sugar and cinnamon; mix well. Add flour and stir to form a soft dough. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a0/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-1Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a0/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-1Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use (screenshot)

"} Sprinkle flour on to workstation, knead the dough until smooth. Allow to rise for 1 hour. Punch dough down and shape into 12 balls. Push your thumb through the center to form a hole. Stretch and shape dough to form an even ring. Place on floured surface. Cover and let rest for 10 - 15 minutes. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/09/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/09/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use (screenshot)

"} Boil some water and pour in a bowl. Drop 2 bagels at a time and leave for 45 seconds, turn over and cook for another 45 seconds. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b3/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b3/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use (screenshot)

"} When finished, take them out the bowl and drain with a paper towel. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/78/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet2.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/78/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet2.jpg/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-4Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use (screenshot)

"} Combine topping ingredients and sprinkle over bagels. Put them in separated, on baking sheets, coated with cooking spray. Bake at 400 degrees for 15 - 20 minutes or until golden brown. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/34/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-5Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/34/Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-5Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Make-Cinnamon-Bagels-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use (screenshot)

"} Enjoy your bagels!
